hero.title: Find your next

hero.setHeroProperty: Set a Hero Featured property in admin

mallorca.title: Explore the Island
mallorca.description: Discover our handpicked collection of luxury properties across Mallorca's most prestigious locations.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Mallorca?
cta.description: Explore our complete collection of luxury villas and fincas across the island. Each property is personally vetted to ensure an exceptional experience.

ibiza.title: The White Isle
ibiza.description: Experience the magic of Ibiza with our exclusive collection of luxury villas featuring stunning views and world-class amenities.

cta.title: Discover Ibiza's Finest
cta.description: From bohemian-chic retreats to ultra-modern estates, find your perfect Ibiza escape with our curated collection.

experience.subtitle: The Experience
experience.title: Redefining
experience.description1: At Prime Luxury Stays, we curate more than accommodations—we craft unforgettable experiences. Each property in our portfolio is handpicked for its exceptional character, premium amenities, and unparalleled locations.
experience.description2: Our dedicated concierge team ensures every aspect of your stay exceeds expectations, from private chef arrangements to exclusive local experiences that money can't normally buy.
experience.quote: "Excellence is not a destination but a continuous journey."

services.subtitle: Bespoke Services
services.title: Beyond Accommodation
services.description: Every detail meticulously orchestrated to create an experience that transcends expectations.

tableReservations.title: Table Reservations
tableReservations.description: Priority bookings at the finest restaurants and exclusive dining venues.

privateAviation.title: Private Aviation
privateAviation.description: Seamless private jet arrangements to and from your destination.

privateChef.title: Private Chef
privateChef.description: World-class chefs creating bespoke culinary experiences in your residence.

luxuryTransport.title: Luxury Transport
luxuryTransport.description: Premium vehicle fleet including supercars and chauffeur services.

travelBookings.title: Travel Bookings
travelBookings.description: Luxury hotel reservations and travel coordination beyond your villa stay.

privacySecurity.title: Privacy & Security
privacySecurity.description: Discreet security arrangements and complete confidentiality guaranteed.

yachtCharter.title: Yacht Charter
yachtCharter.description: Luxury yacht experiences from intimate day sails to multi-day Mediterranean voyages.

helicopter.title: Helicopter Transport
helicopter.description: Swift helicopter transfers and scenic tours across the islands.

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: A Legacy of
about.description: Prime Luxury Stays represents the next evolution in luxury property management. We've assembled a team of industry veterans who share a singular vision: to deliver experiences that redefine what it means to travel in luxury.
about.description2: Our portfolio is carefully curated to include only the most exceptional properties—estates that offer not just accommodation, but transformation. Each residence tells its own story of architectural brilliance, breathtaking locations, and uncompromising attention to detail.
about.floatingCard: Building on decades of industry expertise under a new vision.

contact.subtitle: Begin Your Journey
contact.title: Private Inquiry
contact.description: Our portfolio is available exclusively to qualified clients. Submit your inquiry for a personal consultation.
contact.connectDescription: Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean villa, an alpine retreat, or a beachfront estate, our team is ready to curate your perfect experience.

form.name: Full Name

form.message: Destination preferences, dates, group size, special requirements...

form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us directly.
form.privacyNote: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy. Your information will be kept strictly confidential.

footer.tagline: Curating extraordinary experiences in the world's most exceptional private residences. Where luxury meets legacy.

locationDescriptions.mallorca: The jewel of the Mediterranean. Discover stunning villas, historic fincas, and exclusive beachfront properties on this beautiful island.
locationDescriptions.ibiza: Where luxury meets vibrant energy. Experience world-class properties on the island of endless summer.
locationDescriptions.southOfFrance: The French Riviera awaits. Discover stunning villas, coastal estates, and Provençal charm.

mallorca.heroSubtitle: Where turquoise waters meet ancient mountains. Where every sunset feels like the first. Where your private paradise awaits.
mallorca.diffDesc: We don't simply rent villas—we curate complete Mallorcan experiences. From the moment you inquire, our local team becomes your personal guides to the island's most guarded secrets.

features.dedicatedConciergeDesc: Your personal island expert, available throughout your stay
features.curatedAccessDesc: Exclusive experiences and reservations unavailable elsewhere
features.premiumFleetDesc: From vintage convertibles to luxury yachts at your disposal

mallorca.uniqueDesc: Discover the soul of the Mediterranean

unique.villagesDesc: Stone streets, centuries-old churches, and authentic Mallorcan life
unique.beachesDesc: Crystal coves accessible only by boat or private path
unique.mountainsDesc: UNESCO World Heritage mountain range with dramatic vistas
unique.gastronomyDesc: World-renowned restaurants and authentic local cuisine

mallorca.propertiesDesc: Each property personally selected for its exceptional character
mallorca.noPropertiesDesc: We're currently curating exceptional properties in Mallorca. Register your interest to be the first to know.

ibiza.heroSubtitle: Where bohemian spirit meets ultimate luxury. Where legendary sunsets paint the sky. Where your most memorable moments await.
ibiza.diffDesc: Beyond the clubs and the parties lies another Ibiza—one of hidden coves, ancient villages, and exclusive estates that the world's most discerning travelers seek.

features.dedicatedConciergeDesc: Your personal island expert, available throughout your stay
features.curatedAccessDesc: Exclusive reservations and experiences across the island
features.premiumFleetDesc: Supercars, yachts, and helicopters at your disposal

unique.sunsetsDesc: World-famous evening spectacles at exclusive vantage points
unique.beachesDesc: Secluded coves and crystal-clear waters away from the crowds
unique.cultureDesc: Art, wellness, and the island's unique creative energy
unique.gastronomyDesc: Beach clubs and fine dining with fresh local ingredients

ibiza.propertiesDesc: Each property personally selected for its exceptional character
ibiza.noPropertiesDesc: We're currently curating exceptional properties in Ibiza. Register your interest to be the first to know.

southOfFrance.heroSubtitle: Where lavender fields meet azure waters. Where Provençal charm embraces Riviera glamour. Where timeless elegance awaits.
southOfFrance.diffDesc: From the glamour of Saint-Tropez to the lavender fields of Provence, experience the South of France through our collection of exceptional estates and villas.

features.dedicatedConciergeDesc: Your personal guide to the French art de vivre
features.curatedAccessDesc: Private vineyard tours and Michelin reservations
features.premiumFleetDesc: Classic convertibles and yacht charters along the coast

unique.rivieraDesc: Legendary coastline from Nice to Saint-Tropez
unique.provenceDesc: Rolling lavender fields and charming villages

southOfFrance.propertiesDesc: Each property personally selected for its exceptional character
